channel.title: Homes on Nathan Broadbent
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Nathan Broadbent

item.title: about
item.description: Hello! I’m a full-stack software developer. I build web apps with Ruby on Rails, native iOS apps with Swift and Objective C, and cross-platform apps with React Native (including native code for any platform). I enjoy writing apps that can run everywhere (web, iOS, Android, Windows phone & desktop, and Mac). I also enjoy working on devops (e.g. AWS, Hashicorp tools, Kubernetes), and embedded software for the Raspberry Pi and Arduino.
